about_the_game: The demo contains 11 missions and full tracks from the rock genre. In total, the full game has 77 missions and tracks from 7 music genres: Rock, Pop, Hiphop, Electro, Chill Out, Country and Kids music.
detailed_description: The demo contains 11 missions and full tracks from the rock genre. In total, the full game has 77 missions and tracks from 7 music genres: Rock, Pop, Hiphop, Electro, Chill Out, Country and Kids music.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon 2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs DX9

name: Timo Boll Beats Table Tennis Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: IIntel Core i3-540 Processor (3.06 Ghz)
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
